title: Varlaam Varlaam Vaa Lyrics English Meaning
stanzas:
Varlaam Varlaam Vaa Song Lyrics English Meaning

Lyrics in Thanglish

yaaraa yaarraa ivan
oora ketta theriyum
paarraa munna
vandhu ninnu paaraa
puriyum ...

koooraa nikkum kaththi
kannukulla milirum
thaarumaaraa gilli
pera kaettaa adhirum

varlaam varlaam vaa
varlaam vaa
bairavaaa..(2)

modhum paara kooda
mannaa maari pogattum.
vazhathaara pola
onnaa serndhu vazhattum

seerum kaala ivan
kombil kuththi saaikattum.
oorum paasamellaam
nallaa thala thookkattum

varlaam varlaam vaa
varlaam vaa (2)
varlaam varlaam vaa
varlaam vaa
bairavaaa..

pull up in the middle
with a little bit of
rage and a gas
full of vengeance
gotta put a cap
on my anger, keep cool
gotta handle this
whole situation
how the hell
did i end up here?
third eye blind now,
third eye clear

greedy money
making machine
corrupt and violent
time for thalapathy
to break the silence
self interest of a few
the only reason you
and me going through
what we go through
divide and conquer
evil man’s game
we dont wanna play
we dont wanna play

used to get by doing
bidding for “the man”
now enlightments
come my way
shutdown the system
make my way!
shutdown the system
follow me! follow me!

varlaam varlaam vaa
varlaam vaa
bairavaa (2)

paasathukke thathupulla
thapathy da!!
nesathukke endrum ivan
adhipadhidaa (2)

varlaam varlaam vaa
varlaam vaa (2)

my thirst of payback
is about to be quenched
flow free like water
like bruce lee's revenge
wolf in sheep clothing
see the fake posing
make'em all disappear
like one thousand.

varlaam varlaam vaa		English Meaning
I tried my best :)
Who is he?
You’ll know by his native.
Come before him
To see,
You’ll understand

Sharp knife will
Flash in his eyes.
Ground will shake
when his name is heard!!

Common!! common come!!
Common come!!
Bairavaa!!

Let the striking rock
turn into to sand.
Let it live together
Like a banana stem

He’s a hissing bull
Let it stab with the horn.
Let the oozing love
grow and resurrect.

Common!! common come!!
Common come!!
Common!! common come!!
Common come!!
Bairavaa!!

pull up in the middle
with a little bit of
rage and a gas
full of vengeance
gotta put a cap
on my anger, keep cool
gotta handle this
whole situation
how the hell
did i end up here?
third eye blind now,
third eye clear

greedy money
making machine
corrupt and violent
time for thalapathy
to break the silence
self interest of a few
the only reason you
and me going through
what we go through
divide and conquer
evil man’s game
we dont wanna play
we dont wanna play

used to get by doing
bidding for “the man”
now enlightments
come my way
shutdown the system
make my way!
shutdown the system
follow me! follow me!

Common!! common come!!
Common come!!
Bairavaa!!

Thalapathy!!
Adopted son of “Love”
He’s a Prince
Of being friendly.

Common!! common come!!
Common come!!

my thirst of payback
is about to be quenched
flow free like water
like bruce lee's revenge
wolf in sheep clothing
see the fake posing
make'em all disappear
like one thousand

Common!! common come!!
